mapper.select:
SELECT a.reservation_no, a.reservation_title, a.reservation_start, a.reservation_end, b.asset_id, b.asset_no, b.asset_name, b.team_no, c.name FROM asset_reservation a INNER JOIN asset b ON a.asset_no = b.asset_no INNER JOIN emp c ON a.emp_no = c.emp_no
AND a.asset_no = b.asset_no AND a.emp_no = c.emp_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ASSET_RESERVATION (RESERVATION_NO, EMP_NO, ASSET_NO, RESERVATION_TITLE, RESERVATION_CONTENT, RESERVATION_START, RESERVATION_END) VALUES (reservation_pk_seq.nextval, 1003, #{id}, '#{title}', '예약', '#{start}', '#{end}')
